tagline: MicroLoans for Indian MSMEs — faster capital, smarter underwriting.
elevator_pitch: An AI-driven marketplace connecting MSMEs in India to micro-lenders with instant credit decisions using transaction and GST signals — reducing friction and empowering growth.
executive_summary: PitchPro-powered MicroLoans Marketplace enables MSMEs to access micro-loans with AI-based risk scoring, transparent terms, and a marketplace of lenders. We target urban & semi-urban MSMEs across retail, manufacturing and services, aiming to serve 200k merchants within 3 years.
